name: Beerloma
description: A grapefruit margarita and a hefeweizen had a baby. Served in a .5L over ice.

name: Black Velvet
description: Guinness, coffee liqueur, wyclif brut sparkling

name: Beermosa
description: Jazz up our Paulaner Hefe with a splash of OJ, topped with Prosecco! The perfect breakfast beverage for the beer lover.

name: Original Radler
description: Homage to the original Radler. 50/50 mix of wheat beer and your choice of lemonade or orange soda.
